summary: FOUR TIMES OUR 2018 NISSAN ROGUE HAS ACTIVATED THE EMERGENCY BRAKING SYSTEM, WHEN SLOWING DOWN. AT ONE TIME ,WITH MY WIFE DRIVING THE ENGINE DIED ON A RAILROAD TRACKS. ENGINE RESTARTED BUT WAS SCARY. TAKEN TO NISSAN DEALERSHIP, TWICE, THEY REPLACED A SENSOR, STILL DID THE SAME PROBLEM TWO TIMES AFTER THAT. DEALER CANNOT FIND THE CAUSE. WE BOUGHT THE CAR FOR DEPENDABLE TRANSPORTATION, NOW WITH CAR SALESMEN KNOWING THIS PROBLEM, RESELLING THIS CAR IS A LOST CAUSE. NISSAN NEEDS TO BUY BACK THIS CAR.
